name: OpenDAT
short_description: OpenDAT is a set of open-source tools for administration of a domain based on Windows Server or Samba4. The tools will be designed for both administration of the servers (including Active Directory management, DNS/DHCP-configuration, SMB-share configuration and Group Policy management) and the workstations part of the domain (including policy enforcement, software deployment & updates, system settings and statistics). For the server-side tools the goal will be to provide the same feature set as the Remote Server Administration Tools provided by Microsoft, the client-side tools will have features like those found in for example Centrify and LikeWise.
summary: Open-source Domain Administration Tools for Windows/Samba4 Domains
